snippet.title: Salthe OP Movie (English)
snippet.description:
This is the English opening for Salthe (サルテ), a dark and dramatic visual novel coming to Steam in English and Traditional Chinese on September 15, 2020. The game was developed by Japanese studio Soiree and localized by Shiravune.

Opening Theme: "Nothing"
Movie: Syamo & Shiho Tachibana
Lyrics: Kokoro Sagara
Composition: Mizuki Niito
Vocals: Kokoro Sagara

Steam store page (18+):
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1357840/

Follow Shiravune on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/shiravune
Or join us on Discord:
https://discord.gg/qBmrqDy

Soiree official website (18+):
http://so-iree.com/
* You must be over 18 years of age to use these pages.
